source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_00<tab>Momodi is waiting to brief you on your task.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_00<tab>モモディは冒険者に依頼人を紹介したいようだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_01<tab>It would seem that a horde of hecatoncheires has been wreaking havoc in the depths of Copperbell Mines. So that mining operations may resume, Papashan bids you subdue the hulking creatures. In preparation for the mission, the stationmaster suggests that you speak with Painted Mesa, an employee of Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_01<tab>モモディとパパシャンによれば、カッパーベル銅山の再開発中に現れたヘカトンケイレス族が、銅山の中で暴れているらしい。このままでは、再開発が進まないので、冒険者に鎮圧してほしいそうだ。クイックサンドにいる「ペインテッド・メサ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_02<tab>You learn from Painted Mesa that Copperbell Mines were reopened in order to meet the pressing demand for building materials created in the wake of the Calamity. Without a steady supply, Ul'dah's nascent recovery may slow to a standstill. Make your way to the mines, and report to the Stone Torch who stands guard at the entrance.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_02<tab>ペインテッド・メサから話を聞くことができた。カッパーベル銅山の再開発は、第七霊災からの復興のために進められているらしい。カッパーベル銅山前にいる「鉄灯団の衛兵」に話しかけよう。

source:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_03You've been granted permission to enter the mines. Make your way through the tunnels, putting down any hecatoncheires you encounter.

※Copperbell Mines can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_03カッパーベル銅山探索の許可を、鉄灯団の衛兵から得ることができた。「ヘカトンケイレス族」を鎮圧するため「カッパーベル銅山」を攻略しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_04<tab>You have succeeded in subduing the hecatoncheires. Report back to Painted Mesa at the Quicksand.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_04<tab>無事に、ヘカトンケイレス族を鎮圧することができた。ウルダハに戻り、クイックサンドの「ペインテッド・メサ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_05<tab>Your conversation with Painted Mesa is cut short by a shrill cry. Rushing to the origin of the exclamation, you find a woman being harassed by ruffians, and hurl yourself in harm's way to protect her. Immediately thereafter, <var 08 E4E94702 ((Y'shtola arrives)) ((<var 08 E4E94703 ((Yda and Papalymo arrive)) ((<var 08 E4E94704 ((Thancred arrives)) ((Hildibrand, the bumbling inspector of legend, arrives)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> on the scene.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_05<tab>ペインテッド・メサへの報告中に、女性の悲鳴を聞いた冒険者。女性を助けた冒険者の前に、以前に出会った賢者が現れた。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_06<tab>After praising your courage, <var 08 E4E94702 ((Y'shtola reveals that she belongs)) ((<var 08 E4E94703 ((Yda and Papalymo reveal that they belong)) ((<var 08 E4E94704 ((Thancred reveals that he belongs)) ((the pair reveal that they belong)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> to an order called the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, and <var 08 E4E94702 ((invites you to join them)) ((<var 08 E4E94703 ((invite you to join them)) ((<var 08 E4E94704 ((invites you to join them)) ((invite you to join them)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. But who exactly are these Scions, and what is their agenda? Perhaps Momodi can shed some light on these questions.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_06<tab>自身が秘密組織「暁の血盟」の一員であると明かした賢者は、冒険者を組織へと勧誘するが……。クイックサンドの「モモディ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_07<tab>In the course of your travels, you have crossed paths with myriad individuals, some of whom you have positively influenced. One such individual is the young conjurer Edda, who reveals that you have inspired her to embark upon a new journey as an adventurer. You sense that you, too, must soon embark upon a new journey of your own. Speak with Momodi again when you have resolved to take the first step.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SEQ_07<tab>各都市の問題を解決する中で、様々な冒険者と出会った<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。その中の一人、新人冒険者パーティの幻術士エッダは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の姿勢に心打たれ、冒険者としての再出発を決意したようだ。<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>自身も新たな旅立ちをするときなのかもしれない。旅立ちの決意が固まったら、モモディから「暁の血盟」の話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_3<tab>The petitioner ought to be arrivin' any moment now...
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_3<tab>……そろそろ依頼主がやってくる時間ね。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_4<tab>Gods almighty! Another second under that sun, and I would have been set afire! A tankard of ale, if you would be so kind!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_4やれやれ、今日も暑いな。
いつものを一杯もらえんか。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_5<tab>Excellent timin', Papashan. It just so happens the adventurer who'll be handlin' your petition is here.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_5あら、パパシャン所長。
ちょうど良かった。
依頼されてた件、冒険者が来てくれたわよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_6<tab>Oh? Why, if it isn't my good friend <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_6おや？
お主は、)) (( )) 03 /var>殿！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_7<tab>It does my spirit well to know that you are the one who will be helping us.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_7いやいや、まさか、お主が来てくださるとは。
このパパシャン、感激ですわい。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_8<tab>So this <var 08 E905 ((winsome lass)) ((strapping young lad)) /var> is the much-lauded adventurer, is <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>? Marvelous, marvelous!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_8おや？
お主が噂の冒険者殿か。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_9<tab>A pleasure to make your acquaintance, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((good sir)) /var>. I am Papashan, formerly of the Sultansworn. I thank you for agreeing to lend us your aid.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_9私は元銀冑団のパパシャンと申す者。
依頼を受けてくださって感謝しますぞ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_10<tab>Mayhap you'd like to apprise <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mission?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_10では、所長。
依頼内容を説明してくださる？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_11<tab>Yes, of course. The petition in question was submitted by an acquaintance of mine at Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern. It relates to an unfortunate development at Copperbell Mines.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_11……うむ。
この件、「アマジナ鉱山社」の知人から頼まれたのですが、
実は、ちと物騒な依頼でしてな。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_12<tab>To be plain, giants have seized control of the place.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_12ウルダハ近郊の「カッパーベル銅山」で、
再開発中の最下層から巨人族が現れ、
暴れておるらしいのです。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_13<tab>These giants are of the clan known as the hecatoncheires─fearsome creatures who were sealed within the deepest depths of the mines during the bygone Thorne Dynasty.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_13巨人族とは、その昔、ソーン朝ウルダハ時代に
封印されたはずの「ヘカトンケイレス族」。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_14<tab>Alas, it seems they have managed to break through the layer of rock which served to imprison them, and now prowl the tunnels where the miners ply their trade. The creatures are justifiably angry about their treatment at the hands of our ancestors, and their presence has forced the suspension of all mining activities on the site.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_14どうやら、最下層にあった封印の岩盤が
打ち抜かれたようでしてな……。
このままでは開発ができんと、助けを求められたのですよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_15<tab>It's no wonder they're angry. Didn't the Thorne Dynasty come to an end over three hundred years ago?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_15ソーン朝ウルダハ時代と言えば、
今から300年も昔の話よね？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_16<tab>You know your history well, milady.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_16<tab>さよう……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_17<tab>The people of that age used the hecatoncheires to work their mines. By way of enchanted helms, they were able to bind the ferocious creatures to their will. But as is oft the way in such tales, these enchantments eventually failed, and the slaves rose up against their masters.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_17ソーン朝時代のウルダハ人は、呪術をこめた金属冑を
「ヘカトンケイレス族」にかぶせることで彼らを操り、
怪力の鉱夫として酷使しておったという。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_18<tab>In a desperate bid to contain the unbridled fury of the hecatoncheires, our ancestors induced the collapse of the mines' lowermost levels. So it was that the Great Giant Revolt was ended─buried beneath a hundred thousand tonzes of rock.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_18だが、呪術が不完全だったのか、反乱が勃発。
当時のウルダハ人は、最下層の岩盤を崩落させ、
閉じ込めることで、反乱を鎮圧していたようでしてな。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_19<tab>Well, now...that's got me thinkin'... I seem to recall there bein' an article about Copperbell in the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> a fortnight or so ago.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_19そういえば、霊災後の復興特需に対応するために
アマジナ鉱山社は深層の採掘を決定した……って、
以前「ミスリルアイ誌」に書かれていたわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_20<tab>It said the mines were bein' reopened so as to meet the risin' demand for buildin' materials. Like as not, our boys dug a bit too deep and freed the giants.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_20なるほど……。
それで、再開発中に、最下層の封印ってのを
うっかりブチ抜いちゃったと。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_21<tab>Gods...to think the poor creatures are still alive an' kickin' after three centuries... That's a long time to nurse a grudge. They must be <var 1A 02 /var>seethin'<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_21彼らにしてみれば、300年越しの反乱なのね。
過去からの反乱……何だか浪漫あふれる話だわ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_22<tab>Indeed. And that makes them a danger to us all. There will be no mining at Copperbell so long as they remain. For the sake of both peace and prosperity, they must be subdued. This is the task which we would have you undertake.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_22)) (( )) 03 /var>殿！
どうか「ヘカトンケイレス族」の反乱を
鎮圧していただきたい！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_23<tab>Indeed. And that makes them a danger to us all. There will be no mining at Copperbell so long as they remain. For the sake of both peace and prosperity, they must be subdued. This is the task which we would have you undertake.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_23冒険者殿！
どうか「ヘカトンケイレス族」の反乱を
鎮圧していただきたい！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_24<tab>I'll not deny that the mission will be rife with danger, but our need is great. And so I beg you: put an end to this sorry business.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_24危険な依頼であるのは重々承知しておるが、
何卒、引き受けてくださらぬか！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_25<tab>Gods bless you! I feared you might have reservations, but I assure you it is for the best.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_25ありがたい。
心より、お礼申し上げますぞ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_26<tab>Hmmm... In case you don't know, Copperbell Mines are in western Thanalan. Do take care, you hear?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_26「カッパーベル銅山」は、西ザナラーンにあるわ。
気を付けてね！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_27<tab>Ah, and one last thing before you depart... An employee of Amajina & Sons is presently at the Quicksand. The fellow's name is Painted Mesa, and he knows Copperbell Mines well. It may behoove you to seek his counsel.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPASHAN_000_27すぐそこに、アマジナ鉱山社の者を待たせております。
詳しいことは、その者から聞くと良いでしょう。
よろしく頼みましたぞ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_30<tab>Lookin' for Painted Mesa? You found him.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_30私はペインテッド・メサ。
「アマジナ鉱山社」に勤めている者だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_31<tab>So you're the adventurer who's volunteered to deal with the mess down in Copperbell, are you?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_31「カッパーベル銅山」の「ヘカトンケイレス族」鎮圧の
依頼を受けた冒険者殿かな？
……うむ、ありがたい。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_32<tab>You've got guts, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>. I just hope you've got skills to go with 'em, 'cause things ain't pretty down there. The hecatoncheires've left the place in a right state, and nary a week after minin' resumed.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_32そもそも「カッパーベル銅山」の再開発は、
第七霊災からの復興特需に対応するために
計画されたものなのだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_33<tab>I don't know if you know this, but Copperbell was old when the second Ul Dynasty was still young, and it was abandoned centuries ago. If it hadn't been for the shortage of materials needed for the rebuildin' effort, the Concern would never have thought to reopen it.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_33それが今は、巨人族の反乱によって、
開発中断を余儀なくされている。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_34<tab>We knew full well about the giants beforehand, but the project went ahead anyway. I mean, nothin' could possibly survive bein' buried under a mountain's worth of rock for three centuries, right? <var 1A 02 /var>Wrong<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_34このまま開発が中断し続ければ、
ウルダハの復興計画自体に支障が出てしまうのだ。
それだけは、なんとしても避けねばならん！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_35<tab>Our miners dug up more than they bargained for. One swing of the pickaxe too many, and they found 'emselves in the company of giants. Unless we can subdue 'em, the nation's glorious recovery'll grind to a halt for want of aught to build with.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_35現在「カッパーベル銅山」は、
アマジナ鉱山社の自警組織「鉄灯団」が警備している。
銅山内部への突入許可は、鉄灯団の者から取ってくれ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_36<tab>The Stone Torches're keepin' watch over the entrance in case the giants fancy some sunlight and fresh air. One of 'em will be able to show you the way in. The hope of the nation's restin' on you, friend. Best of luck!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_36それでは、活躍を期待しているぞ。
ウルダハの未来は、貴公の双肩にかかっておるのだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_40<tab>There's been an incident inside Copperbell Mines. We are here to ensure that its effects are contained, but for your own safety, I suggest you stay well away from here.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_40ここはアマジナ鉱山社所有の「カッパーベル銅山」。
君のような冒険者には無縁の場所だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_41<tab>What? You're the adventurer who's volunteered to quell the hecatoncheires?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_41……なに？
パパシャン所長たちから依頼を受けて
「ヘカトンケイレス族」の鎮圧に来た、だと？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_42<tab>I didn't think that Papashan would be able to find someone so quickly...if at all.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_42おお、こんなに早く来てもらえるとは！
ありがたい、さっそく鎮圧にかかってくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_43<tab>The giants are content to wreak havoc inside the mines for now, but it's only a matter of time before they think to come outside. The sooner you see to them, the better. Make ready as best you can, and enter at will.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_43外の警備は我々「鉄灯団」に任せたまえ。
事情を知らぬ興味本位の輩が迷いこまぬよう、
しっかり見張っていよう！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_50<tab>I have been an adventurer for long years, and borne witness to many a pivotal moment in history. Though the times may have changed, the essence of our trade has not.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_50わしらも長い間、冒険者をやっておるが、
いつの時代も本質は変わらん。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_51<tab>Adventuring has ever been a quest for self-betterment through challenges freely faced, and ever shall it remain so.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_51冒険者とは本来、「冒険」それ自体のために、
挑戦を試みる者たちのことだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_52<tab>As an adventurer becomes more experienced, he will naturally acquire a love of justice, and an understanding of the spirit of self-sacrifice.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_52冒険者は、冒険を通して成長していく。
謙譲さ、勇敢さ、献身さ、そして正義の心がな。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_53<tab>Such experience cannot be measured in any tangible way, yet it most assuredly shapes who we are, grounded as it is in the decisions we have made on our journey, and their consequences, good or ill.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_53それらは、数字では現れるものではない。
だが、人と人の絆に着実に根付き、
自分という存在を大きくしていく。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_54<tab>I sense a light within you, young one, and it tells me that you are destined for greatness.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ISILDAURE_000_54わしは、お前さんに何か光るものを感じとる。
立派な冒険者になることを祈っておるよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_60<tab>We found Dolorous Bear and his entire party dead. The giants were...thorough in their work.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_60さっき、ドールラス・ベアーっていう
冒険者のパーティの遺体を運び出したの……。
あの人、ベテランの冒険者だったのに……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_61<tab>Judging by their tracks, it would seem they tried to rush a horde of the creatures. I cannot say for sure what drove an experienced crew like theirs to throw caution to the wind...but I do have my suspicions.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_61彼らは、あなたに冒険者としての可能性を感じたのね。
あなたの姿をみて焦っていたの。
そして、その焦りが事故を生んだ……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_62<tab>We are all our own worst critics, and our desire to better past achievements can rob us of good sense. Thus do we become more given to recklessness.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_62いつも、お爺ちゃんが言ってるわ。
人は求めすぎると、足元を見失ってしまうものだって。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_63<tab>While it is important to have goals, one must not fixate upon them to the exclusion of all else. Do so, and one will surely pay the price, as Dolorous Bear and his comrades did this day.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_ALIANNE_000_63富や名誉を目標に掲げるのは素晴らしいことよ。
でも、目標を大きくしすぎて、
あなたも足元を見失わないようにしてね。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_65<tab>The hope of the nation's restin' on your shoulders, friend. Send them giants back to whichever of the seven hells they escaped from!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_65「カッパーベル銅山」の
「ヘカトンケイレス族」を鎮圧してくれたまえ。
活躍を期待しているぞ、冒険者殿。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_67<tab>Good luck in there, adventurer. We Stone Torches will continue our vigil here, lest the foe slip by you.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_STONETORCH_000_67「ヘカトンケイレス族」鎮圧は君に任せる。
外の警備は、我々「鉄灯団」が引き受けよう。

source:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_Q1_000_1Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Into a Copper Hell”?
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_Q1_000_1<tab>クエスト「カッパーベルで消える夢」のバトルを開始しますか？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_A1_000_1<tab>はい

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_A1_000_2<tab>No
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_A1_000_2<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_70<tab>Ah, the conqueror of Copperbell returns!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_70おお、冒険者殿。
話は聞いた！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_71<tab>Thanks to you, our minin' operations can resume, and Ul'dah will have the materials she needs to rebuild. The entire nation's in your debt, friend.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_71「カッパーベル銅山」を解放してくれたのだろう！
よくやってくれた、助かったぞ！
これで、開発を続けることもできよう。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_72<tab>I'll share the good tidin's with Papashan the next time I see him. As for you, you'll want to report to Momodi. It'll do the woman well to see you alive and in one piece.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAINTEDMESA_000_72パパシャン所長には、私から礼を言っておく。
貴公は、モモディ女史に報告に行くといい。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_100<tab>(-???-)Noooooo!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_100<tab>(-？？？？-)キャァァァァ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_101<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)Shut your mouth, you thieving little swine! You stole from me─don't even think to deny it!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_101(-ガラの悪い商人-)おおう！
うちの店から、食い物を盗んだってのは
わかってるんだ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_102<tab>P-Please, sir, I didn't steal nothin'!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_102そ、そんな！
私はやっていません……！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_103<tab>I b-bought this─paid for it with me own coin!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_103<tab>これは、ちゃんと買ったものです！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_104<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)What rot! You refugees are all the same─couldn't afford maggoty mole meat, much less a choice cut of dodo!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_104(-ガラの悪い商人-)うるせぇ！
お前たち難民が、肉を買えるほどの金を
持ってるわけがないだろう！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_105<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)I'm going to say it one more time: give back what you stole, or I'll make you wish you'd never set foot in this town!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_105<tab>(-ガラの悪い商人-)さっさと盗んだモールの肉を出しな！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_106<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)By rights, I should turn you over to the Brass Blades, you know─help keep the streets safe for law-abiding citizens. But I'm a reasonable man. If you agree to serve me in...whatever capacity I require, the authorities needn't hear of your crime.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_106(-ガラの悪い商人-)それとも？
別の稼ぎ方で返してもらってもいいんだぜ？
……なぁ？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_107<tab>B-But I ain't done nothin' wrong! Twelve as me witness!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_107<tab>ど、どなたかお助けを！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_108<tab>P-Please, adventurer! Help me, I beg o' ye!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_108お、お願いです、冒険者様！
助けてください！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_109<tab>I swear on me mother's grave, I didn't steal nothin'! I bought this with the coin I'd saved... <sob> I only wanted to treat me children to a decent meal...
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_109私は何もしていません！
本当に、ちゃんと買ったものなんです！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_110<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)And who the hells are you when you're at home!? This dog's master?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_110(-ガラの悪い商人-)なんだぁ？
てめぇ、この女の仲間か！？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_111<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)I've had enough of this mummer's farce. You lot, teach them a lesson!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_111(-ガラの悪い商人-)構わねぇ。
お前ら、やっちまえ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_HEAVY_000_120<tab>I ain't gettin' paid enough for this!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_HEAVY_000_120な、なんだこいつ！？
ズラかるぞ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_121<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)H-Hey! Where the hells do you think you're going!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_121(-ガラの悪い商人-)こ、こら待て！
こんのやろう、使えない奴らめ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_122<tab>Thank ye, kind adventurer! Thank ye thrice over!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_122あ、ありがとうございます……。
助かりました……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_130<tab>I'd swear there were more refugees than when I last looked...
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_130<tab>また難民が増えたんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_131<tab>And you wouldn't be mistaken.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_131<tab>ああ、「霊災難民」ってやつだろ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_132<tab>But it's been five years since the Calamity! Why are they only coming here now?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_132第七霊災、それに先の大戦で、
住むところを失った人々……か。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_133<tab>It's simple, really─while a number of hamlets survived the immediate aftermath of the Calamity, many were no longer able to support their communities.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_133個人だけじゃない。
一連の霊災の影響で物流が途切れて、
村ごと捨てたってのも、よく聞く話だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_134<tab>The residents found their lands had either been rendered barren, or cut off from trade routes─and problems like those aren't easily solved. Though they tried to make the best of it, it was only a matter of time before they were forced to abandon their homes and seek a new life in the city.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_134生きてるのなら、まだ幸せかもしれん。
食糧難で全滅した村も多いと言うからな……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_135<tab>I see...
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_135難民が、辺境から都市部へと
移ってきているのは知っていたが……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_136<tab>But the Calamity affected the whole realm, didn't it? Is the same thing happening in the other cities?
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_136<tab>増えているのは、ウルダハだけなのか？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_137<tab>If the talk is true, yes.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_137<tab>どの国も同じらしいぞ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_138<tab>Though perhaps our situation is more pronounced. Ul'dah has a reputation for being prosperous, so it's natural that the refugees would try their luck here first.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_138もっとも、ウルダハは物資が豊かな「商都」だからな。
食い扶持があるとでも思われているんだろ。
ほかに比べれば多いかもしれん。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_139<tab>My heart goes out to them, it truly does...but I would be lying if I said that I wasn't apprehensive. I hope their presence doesn't foment lawlessness in the city.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_139<tab>治安が悪化しないといいが。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_140<tab>Well, if things do take a turn for the worse, we always have the Immortal Flames. I daresay the Brass Blades would welcome their help.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_140<tab>そこは「不滅隊」を警備に回すとか。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_141<tab>The heroes who fought the Garlean Empire, patrolling the streets for riffraff?
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_141<tab>グランドカンパニーまで出してるのか？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_142<tab>It may well come to that.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_142<tab>ラウバーン様が上手くやるだろうさ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_143<tab>Impoverished and desperate as they are, you may be sure that some of the refugees will turn to crime.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_143それより怖いのは暴動だよ。
難民には家も職もない奴が多いからな。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_144<tab>You know what this place is like. If you've no coin, you've no hope.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_144富がものをいうウルダハで、
そんな状況が長く続けばどうなるか。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_145<tab><sigh> What will become of our city?
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_145<tab>不安だな……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_146<tab>Not <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> refugees are bad, mind you. Some are able to find employment and lead honest lives.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_RESTLESSULD_000_146まぁ、難民が全て悪いってわけじゃない。
運良く職を見つけたヤツらは、
まっとうな生活をしているわけだからな。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SALESPITCH_000_147<tab>Dodo tenderloins! Get yer dodo tenderloins! Guaranteed cheapest in Thanalan!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SALESPITCH_000_147今日はモールの肉が大特価だ！
奥さんどうだい、安くしとくよ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SALESPITCH_000_148<tab>Thank ye for yer custom, madam! Please come again!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_SALESPITCH_000_148毎度～！
また来てちょうだいね～！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_149<tab>Looking around, you'd think that Ul'dah was well on its way to recovery.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_149……復興が華やかに進んでいるように見えて、
その裏で、増える一方の難民。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_150<tab>But peer through the veil of prosperity and you'll see no end to the misery and suffering.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YOUNGULD_000_150<tab>エオルゼアの光と闇ってとこか……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_160<tab>Er...<var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? Are ye all right?
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_160<tab>もし……？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_161<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)Wh-What now!? You mean to threaten a defenseless citizen!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_161(-ガラの悪い商人-)なんだ！
や、やろうってのか！？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_162<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)...What? Saw her buy that meat, you say? Th-That's absurd!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_162(-ガラの悪い商人-)……なんだと？
この女が、ちゃんと買ってるところを見ただと！？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_AGENT_000_163<tab>(-???-)Aye, as did I! Leave the poor woman alone, you damnable vulture!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_AGENT_000_163(-？？？？-)そうだ、こっちもちゃんと見てたぞ！
言い掛かりは止めろ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_164<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)Wh-Who said that!?
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_164<tab>(-ガラの悪い商人-)だ、だれだ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_165<tab>(-Obnoxious Merchant-)Grrr! I will overlook this...but just this once!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_UNGUST_000_165(-ガラの悪い商人-)チッ！
覚えとけよ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_166<tab>Gods bless ye, adventurer! If ye hadn't come along when ye did, who knows what that monster might've done!? It don't bear thinkin' about...
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_POORDRESS_000_166本当に助かりました。
ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_170<tab>(-???-)Case closed!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_170<tab>(-？？？？-)一件落着……だね！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_171<tab>Hello again!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_171<tab>ヤッホー！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_172<tab>We have been keeping a close eye on you ever since you left Gridania.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_172君がグリダニアを発ってからの行動を
しばらく見させてもらってたよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_173<tab>You discharged your duty as envoy impeccably, and never once faltered in the face of myriad dangers.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_173使者としての謙譲な振る舞い。
危険を省みず困難に挑戦していく勇敢さ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_174<tab>But more importantly, you were always ready to help those in need, even if you didn't stand to earn a gil by doing so!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_174自分の利益を顧みないで自己の力を尽くす献身さ。
困った人を助ける正義の心！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_175<tab>You are possessed of all the qualities we seek in an adventurer, of this we are convinced.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_175<tab>どれも冒険者として、十分な素質の持ち主だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_176<tab>Even if you <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> kind of dragged into that business with the dodo meat.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_176ま、さっきのは、どっちかってゆーと
巻き込まれてたけど。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_177<tab>Yes, <var 1A 02 /var>thank you<var 1A 01 /var>, Yda. Ahem. And then there is the matter of your gift. I daresay you are curious as to the nature of the vision you bore witness to moments ago? Well, we can help you to understand it.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_177そして、君の持つ能力……「超える力」。
君が見てきた「幻」が一体何なのか、興味はないかい？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_178<tab>You're not the only one with that power, you know. We have a friend who has it too, and we'd love for you to meet her.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_178あたしたちは、キミと同じ力を持つ人を知ってるんだ。
その人と、ある計画を進めていてね。
そのために、キミの力を借りたいんだ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_179<tab>And meeting her is only the beginning, for we would also have you lend your strength to our cause. In return, we should be glad to assist your adventuring endeavors in whatever way we are able.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_179君が力を貸してくれれば、
僕たちは、君が冒険者として活躍するための
援助をすることもできる。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_180<tab>Should you decide to take us up on our offer─and I sincerely hope you will─pray speak with Momodi. The proprietress of the Quicksand is a good friend of ours. She will tell you where to find us.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_PAPALYMO_000_180これから、冒険者ギルドへ報告に戻るんだろ？
クイックサンドのモモディには話を通してある。
興味があるなら、彼女に話を聞いてみてくれよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_181<tab>Waaait a minute─we haven't even told you the name of our order! We're the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, defenders of justice! Oh, but don't tell anyone. Except for Momodi. She knows already.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YDA_000_181あたしたちは、秘密組織「暁の血盟」の一員なの。
ちょっとした正義の味方ってわけ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_190<tab>(-???-)Ever the selfless hero, I see.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_190<tab>(-？？？？-)一件落着……かしら？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_191<tab>It has been a while, adventurer.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_191<tab>お久しぶりね。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_192<tab>I have been watching you closely ever since you flew out of Limsa Lominsa.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_192あなたがリムサ・ロミンサを発ってからの行動を
しばらく見させてもらっていたわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_193<tab>You discharged your duty as the Admiral's personal envoy with admirable humility, and you have displayed unfaltering courage in the face of danger ever since.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_193使者としての謙譲な振る舞い。
危険を省みず困難に挑戦していく勇敢さ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_194<tab>Whensoever you came upon those in need, you gave them succor with no thought of personal gain.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_194自分の利益を顧みないで自己の力を尽くす献身さ。
困った人を助ける正義の心。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_195<tab>In summary, you have demonstrated all of the qualities we seek in an adventurer.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_195<tab>どれも冒険者として、十分な素質の持ち主ね。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_196<tab>For reasons I cannot well explain, your every deed seems invariably to serve the general good...whether you mean it to or not. It is a happy knack, and one which speaks volumes for your character!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_196まぁ……さっきのは、どっちかっていうと
巻き込まれていたようだけど。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_197<tab>Yet for all your admirable qualities, it is your <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var> which intrigues me most. I speak of the visions you experience. Visions like the one you had mere moments ago, if I am not mistaken. I can provide you with the means to understand them.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_197そして、あなたの持つ能力……「超える力」。
あなたが見てきた「幻」が一体何なのか、興味はない？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_198<tab>An acquaintance of mine is blessed with the selfsame talent, you see... If you so desire, I can introduce you to her. She and I fight for a common cause─a cause which would greatly benefit for your support.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_198私は、あなたと同じ力を持つ人を知っている。
その人と、ある計画を進めているの。
そのために、あなたの力を借りたいのよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_199<tab>If you would agree to lend us your strength, we should be glad to do all within our power to aid you in your personal endeavors.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_199あなたが力を貸してくれれば、
私たちは、あなたが冒険者として活躍するための
援助をすることもできる。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_200<tab>Think on my offer awhile. Should you decide to accept it, pray speak with Momodi. The proprietress of the Quicksand is a close friend and ally of ours.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_200これから、冒険者ギルドへ報告に戻るんでしょ？
クイックサンドのモモディさんには話を通してあるわ。
興味があるなら、彼女に話を聞いて。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_201<tab>Inform her that you have been chosen by the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, and she will tell you where to find us.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_YSHTOLA_000_201私たちは、秘密組織「暁の血盟」の一員。
ちょっとした正義の味方ってところかな。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_210<tab>(-???-)All's well that ends well!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_210<tab>(-？？？？-)一件落着……かな？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_211<tab>We meet again!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_211よっ！
しばらくだな！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_212<tab>Pray do not mistake my intent─for it is <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> honorable─but I have been watching you ever since you departed Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_212君がウルダハを発ってからの行動を
しばらく見させてもらっていたよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_213<tab>You played the part of envoy to perfection─confident as a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> on a diplomatic mission should be, yet unfailingly courteous to your betters. And when your travels led you into the midst of danger, you faced it without so much as a flinch. You, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((friend)) /var>, are quite a marvel, and I confess to being <var 08 E905 ((quite taken with)) ((somewhat in awe of)) /var> you!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_213使者としての謙譲な振る舞い。
危険を省みず困難に挑戦していく勇敢さ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_214<tab>Ah, but my lavish praise continues. Most of all, I was struck by your readiness to aid those in need, even when words were all the reward you could expect to receive. Such selflessness is a rare thing in this day and age.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_214自分の利益を顧みないで自己の力を尽くす献身さ。
困った人を助ける正義の心。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_215<tab>...All of which leads me to conclude that you are indeed the one whom I have been looking for─an adventurer possessed of a very rare set of qualities.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_215<tab>どれも冒険者として、十分な素質の持ち主だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_216<tab>To be sure, your rescue of that damsel in distress was more of a happy accident. But rescue her you did, and that is what matters in the end.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_216まぁ、さっきのは、どっちかっていうと
巻き込まれたけどな。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_217<tab>I feel I should mention at this point that I <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> harbor a burning interest in a certain talent of yours. I speak of your visions. You <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> been experiencing visions, have you not?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_217そして、君の持つ能力……「超える力」。
君が見てきた「幻」が一体何なのか、興味はないか？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_218<tab>Well, it just so happens that I know a woman who shares your talent, and can help you to understand it. She and I belong to the same organization, and we should both be delighted beyond words if you would agree to join our cause.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_218俺は、君と同じ力を持つ人を知っている。
その人と、ある計画を進めていてね。
そのために、君の力を借りたいんだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_219<tab>Naturally, there are benefits to being part of such a collective. For one, we should be glad to assist you in realizing your potential as an adventurer.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_219君が力を貸してくれれば、
俺たちは、君が冒険者として活躍するための
援助をすることもできる。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_220<tab>You need not give me your answer now. Think upon it, and if you feel moved to help us─as I pray you shall─speak with Momodi, the ever-lovely and youthful mistress of the Quicksand.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_220これから、冒険者ギルドへ報告に戻るんだろ？
クイックサンドのモモディさんには話を通してある。
興味があるなら、彼女に話を聞いてみてくれ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_221<tab>Tell her the Scions of the Seventh Dawn have found their <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, and she will tell you where to find us.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_THANCRED_000_221俺たちは、秘密組織「暁の血盟」の一員だ。
ちょっとした正義の味方ってところさ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_230<tab>Hmph. Scenes like that are becomin' ever more common, I'm afraid. Don't worry, though─if you work hard, you'll probably be all right.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_230あらあら……また揉め事があったみたいね。
でも、ここじゃ日常茶飯事なの。
ウルダハでがんばるなら、ああいう風になっちゃだめよ？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_231<tab>Sayin' that, if you ever find yourself in a spot of bother, come and see me. Just don't go pesterin' me every time you graze your knee, eh?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_231それじゃ、がんばってね。
何かあれば相談に乗るわよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_232<tab>...'Course, I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> enjoy hearin' tell of a gentleman's woes with the womenfolk from time to time...
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_232……でも、人生相談はお断り。
恋愛相談なら考えてあげてもいいわ。
ウフフ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_233<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Sorry to keep you waitin'─I was just providin' guidance to a fresh-off-the-carriage adventurer.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_233あら、おかえりなさい！
新人の冒険者が登録に来ていたの。
お待たせしたかしら。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_234<tab>But gods, it's good to see you safe and well! To look at you, no one would ever guess you'd been hard at it with giants in the dark!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_234そうそう、アマジナ鉱山社から連絡が来てたわ！
よくやってくれたわね！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_235<tab>I never doubted for a moment that you'd succeed, of course, and neither did Papashan─which ain't to say he won't be overjoyed!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_235さすがは、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あなたなら、解決してくれると思ってたの！
パパシャン所長も喜んでいたわよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_236<tab>You're every ilm the adventurer Miounne said you'd be, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The stationmaster will be overjoyed when he hears the news!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_236さすがは噂の冒険者さん。
評判通りの実力ね！
パパシャン所長も喜んでいたわよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_237<tab>Oh, before I forget, there's a lass here who wants a word with you. Didn't actually know your name, but hearin' her description, I knew who she meant right away.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_237あなたに紹介したい人がいるの。
こっちへいらっしゃい。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_238<tab>Th-Thank you for sparing the time. I realize you don't know me, but I've been longing to speak with you for a while now.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_238は、はじめまして。
わたしはエッダと言います。
あなたと一度、お話がしたかったのです。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_239<tab>My name is Edda. I'm an adventurer like you, though I'm not very good at being one, if truth be told. Anyway, I was adventuring with my friends in Gridania when...when... I-I'm sorry. We were in Gridania...when the leader of our party was killed.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_239わたしは以前、新人の冒険者同士で冒険をしていました。
でも、リーダーだったアヴィールは、
グリダニアで命を失いました……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_240<tab>His name was Avere, and he and I were to be wed in the spring. You may not remember him, but to say that he remembered you would be an understatement. He would sing your praises from dawn to dusk. He saw you for what you are, you see─an adventurer's adventurer─and swore that he would be like you one day.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_240アヴィールは、最初にあなたを見かけてから、
ずっとあなたの話をしていました。
……あの冒険者は、きっとできるやつだって。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_241<tab>I believe that he would have succeeded...had a fiend not robbed him of the chance. Since that day, I have thought long and hard about giving up adventuring.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_241アヴィールはわたしの婚約者だったんです……。
彼が亡くなったあと、冒険者を辞めようと思いました。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_242<tab>But when I think of the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> you are─of all that you've achieved─I find that I am inspired, just as Avere once was.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_242……でも、彼が言っていたように、
あなたの姿や戦うところを見ていると、
いつか、こういう冒険者になりたいと思ったのです。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_243<tab>And so I've decided to start again as an adventurer. I will go back to the village of my birth and begin my training anew.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_243だから、田舎に帰って、
冒険者の修行を一からやり直すつもりです。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_244<tab>But I wanted to meet you first...to ask you your name.
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_244<tab>最後に、お名前を伺ってもいいですか？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_245<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>... I shan't forget.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_245。
素敵なお名前……。
ありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_246<tab>Thank you, <var 29 EB02 /var>. I pray that we will meet again. Fare you well!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_EDDA_000_246お話を聞いてくださって、ありがとうございました。
さようなら！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_247<tab>Adventurin' can be a cruel bleedin' business... Time was, I didn't know why anyone would bother. When they first asked me to take charge of the guild here, I didn't want aught to do with you lot─thought it'd be a right pain in the arse lookin' after you all.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_247……最初は、冒険者ギルドの顔役だなんて、
面倒でイヤだったんだけど、
今では、やってよかったと思っているわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_248<tab>But against my better judgment, I decided to accept the post...and I'm full glad I did. I feel privileged to be a part of your lives.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_248新人の冒険者に、ベテランの冒険者……。
新しい顔に、消え逝く顔……。
いろいろな人生を垣間見ることができる。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_249<tab>And that goes double for yours, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_249それに、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あなたに出会うこともできたもの！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_250<tab>...Eh? What did you say? You want to know about the Scions of the Seventh Dawn?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_250……あら？
「暁の血盟」ですって？

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_251<tab>They're beginnin' to move in earnest, then...
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_251そう。
ついに動き出したのね……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_252<tab>Listen, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the Scions ain't no ordinary folk, and the work they do ain't no ordinary work. I know full well how capable you are, but even <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> would think twice about attemptin' some of the stuff they do. Knowin' that, if you're still certain you want to get involved, I'll tell you what I can.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_MOMODI_000_252興味があるなら、声をかけてくれるかしら？
彼らの拠点を教えてあげるわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_TODO_001<tab>Defeat the bodyguards!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_TODO_001<tab>用心棒たちを倒せ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_001<tab><belch> I'll take care o' this. The rest o' ye can watch.
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_001冒険者か……俺一人で十分だぜ。
ブチのめしてやるよ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_002<tab>Hmph! Not bad...for an adventurer!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_002<tab>な、なかなかやるじゃねえか！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_003<tab>Ugh... I should've stopped at the seventh ale...
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_003<tab>あ、あれ？　ちょっと調子が悪りいな……。

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_004<tab>Stop bloody gawpin' at me and give me a hand, will ye!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_004お、おいっ！
てめぇら、突っ立ってないで手伝いやがれ！

source: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_005<tab>Bugger, bugger, BUGGER!
target: TEXT_MANFST205_00660_QIB_HEAVYA_BATTLETALK_005<tab>く、くそっ！　何なんだよコイツは！？
